.container {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      background-color: navajowhite;
      width: 100%;
    }

    .inner-container {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      background-color: mediumslateblue;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      margin: 5px;
    }

    .child-a {
      width: 100%;
      background-color: mediumseagreen;
    }

    .child-b {
      width: 100%;
      background-color: pink;
    }

    .child-a,
    .child-b {
      margin: 10px;
    }
